body_html:
Ooops, sorry, I think I mistakenly approved this PR. This isn't a typo, it is intentional that we're re-using the variables in the dense2 layer. With the changed code, the comment is incorrect (it is not re-using any variables)

Will roll this back.

body:
Ooops, sorry, I think I mistakenly approved this PR. This isn't a typo, it is intentional that we're re-using the variables in the `dense2` layer. With the changed code, the comment is incorrect (it is not re-using any variables)

Will roll this back.
